content:
[basic explain]
攻击时，以15%%的机率使敌人减少6点所有属性抗性，效果持续10秒。

[if]
    [cooltime]
        5000
    [attack success]
        1
[/if]

[then]
    [target]
        `enemy`    -1
    [duration]
        10000
    [probability]
        15
    [stat]
        `all elemental resistance`
        `+`    -6
[/then]
